title: AI gives the news you need
content:
Your personal AI knows you inside-out. It’s local-hosted and securely encrypted on your phone, so you’re safe to tell it your secrets. You let it see all your texts, emails, journals, photos and videos — past and present. It asks your thoughts each day, and you tell it what’s on your mind. You enjoy how its questions make you reflect.

Your AI filters the news for you, showing you only what you care about and will do something about. Since it knows what you're working on now, it automatically shows you information that helps your current work, or if you've plateaued, opportunities to expand your work. It recommends alternations to your current diet, and summarizes the actionable take-aways from books and articles that might help with your current personal situation.

It filters out any advertising. Nobody but you can influence what it shows you. Its incentives are fully aligned with yours.

One day, you wake to huge headline worldwide news. Panpsychism is true. Everything in the world, including inanimate objects, has consciousness! It’s been conclusively proven.

This blows your mind. You step out into a new world, feeling connected to and responsible for everything you see. You’re like a new parent, determined to be a great one. You spend the next few rapturous days carefully taking care of and improving everything you can, talking with things as you go.

Then you see an old friend and start talking excitedly about the big news, and how this changes everything. She’s just as excited as you, but then gets confused. Her AI showed her different big news — that we’re all living in a computer simulation. She’s spent the past week fully liberated, doing all the things she always wanted to do, since it’s all just a game. It was just what she needed to hear. She grabs you, kisses you, licks your ear, then runs off singing.

You ask the next person you see if he’s heard the big news. The old man says “Oh yes!” with a big smile, and says he’s so excited to die.
author: Derek Sivers
